title: If you feel you are awakening, how do you resist the effects of other people’s egos to let awakening proceed unhindered? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re affected by other peoples egos then you are not in an “awakening process.” Work on becoming unaffected by other peoples egos and the best place to start on that is your own ego. Oh yes… you’ve got one. Good rule of thumb for knowing when ego is at work; “Only an ego can be affected by other egos.”
You would simply accept other peoples egos as they are, perfect. Just by allowing, lets the flow continue. If you resist it will persist. ;) Short answer: Surrender.
